Text:
Hey cody ;)

May i ask if you would consider doing "Cop land" (1997). 

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8422727/Cop.Land.1997.REMASTERED.DC.720p.BluRay.DTS.x264-PublicHD


Thanks anyway, whatever you'll decide. :)

It really annoys me when uploaders delete the "Texted Language(s)" field, which in this case would have informed us at the top of the page that this share has only ROMANIAN fucking subtitles.  Instead, I had to read through all of the share's technical info, in which the subtitle description was listed only near the very bottom — that's an issue for a movie like this which has so much non-English dialog but uploads with English subs are nearly nonexistent.

Why get rid of the "Texted Language(s)" info field if you're just going to include that info anyways but burry it deep in your own description about the upload?

Thanks for the share, but no thanks for fucking around with TPB's information template, which millions of people rely on to quickly find what they're looking for.

@Alobarku:

I am ashamed for your language!

You are "something" that should not be allowed on TPB.

For your knowledge, Romanian is not a language listed for upload nor for audio, neither for subtitles !

I hope you'll get what you deserve: permanent ban .

@Alobarku:

So ... you are not banned, because your bad language "isn't spam".

Than, you should know that you are way out of your league. Upload a single quality torrent and you'll know what am I talking about !

If you think ...  that I must pay for your ignorance, your miss -education and ... obviously ... your borderline IQ ... you are very wrong.

All your "qualities" recommend you for all the "goodies" in this life.  What goes around comes around !!

Have a nice life.
